title: Account Stolen,i need help.
body: So 2 days ago somebody logged on my account from another PC,i made a ticket to Riot and i said if that guy gets my account again ban him,today i got permanent ban on my account and i didn't even play.What should i do now?I don't know why i got permanent ban,i guess that guy flamed 2 games(he played 2 games) and i got permanent ban?Please help me.

replies.body:
Since you've already opened up a support ticket, the best thing to do in this situation is to wait for a reply from the account specialists. You can inquire about the suspension on your account as well as any other account-specific questions you may have.

If you have any other questions, feel free to reach back out to me.
